name: Blox (itch) (Stephens Clan Gaming)
description:
You are a cute little blue block. But you are not in a very safe place. Not-so-cute angry red blocks are out to kill you. Not to mention that they have booby trapped everything. And stolen your money and scattered it everywhere. And their evil green minions are flying just about everywhere. So go grab your money and avoid being killed!

In game tutorials will teach you keyboard controls.

This game has gamepad support.

MoveLeft JoystickFireRT (R2)JumpARead SignXReset LevelYReset GameB
